weekly picks (Mar 4 week 2024)

Posted on March 25, 2024 in 2024mar,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2024 Mar 4th week collection

  1. PhysRevLett.132.136701 Lossless Spin-Orbit Torque in Antiferromagnetic Topological Insulator MnBi2Te4 (PRL)

  2. PhysRevLett.132.136801 Brownian Electric Bubble Quasiparticles (PRL)

  3. 2403.16496 Evidence for a finite-momentum Cooper pair in tricolor d-wave superconducting superlattices (arXiv)

  4. 2403.16119 Pressure-tuning topological phase transitions in Kagome superconductor CsTi3Bi5 (arXiv)

  5. 2403.16969 Signatures of canted antiferromagnetism in infinite-layer nickelates studied by x-ray magnetic dichroism (arXiv)

  6. 2403.17003 Multiple Chern bands in twisted MoTe2 and possible non-Abelian states (arXiv)

  7. 2403.16586 Intrinsic Dipole Hall effect in tMoTe2 moire: magnetoelectricity and contact-free signature of topological transitions (arXiv)

  8. 2403.15820 The fractional quantum Hall nematics on the first Landau level in a tilted field (arXiv)

  9. 2403.15546 Bridging the small and large in twisted transition metal dicalcogenide homobilayers: a tight binding model capturing orbital interference and topology across a wide range of twist angles (arXiv)

  10. 2403.16931 Embedded skyrmion bags in thin films of chiral magnets (arXiv)

  11. 2403.15912 Observation of the dual quantum spin Hall insulator by density-tuned correlations in a van der Waals monolayer (arXiv)

  12. 2403.16725 Skyrmionic device for three dimensional magnetic field sensing enabled by spin-orbit torques (arXiv)

  13. 2403.16531 Giant Hall effect in two-dimensional CoSi2 granular arrays (arXiv)

  14. 2403.16195 Ideal spin-polarized Weyl-half-semimetal with a single pair of Weyl points in half-Heusler compounds XCrTe (X=K, Rb) (arXiv)

  15. 2403.15558 Tunable ultrastrong magnon magnon coupling and spin Hall magnetoresistance in a van der Waals antiferromagnet (arXiv)

  16. 2403.15748 Efficient semiclassical approximation for bound states in graphene in magnetic field with a small trigonal warping correction (arXiv)

  17. 2403.14851 Edge currents as probe of topology in twisted cuprate bilayers (arXiv)

  18. 2403.14756 Magnonic Superconductivity (arXiv)

  19. 2403.15386 Magnetic, charge, and bond order in the two-dimensional Su-Schrieffer-Heeger-Holstein model (arXiv)

  20. 2403.14768 Universality of mean-field antiferromagnetic order in an anisotropic 3D Hubbard model at half-filling (arXiv)

  21. 2403.15348 Crossover from relativistic to non-relativistic net magnetization for MnTe altermagnet candidate (arXiv)

  22. 2403.15050 Quantum Valley Hall effect without Berry curvature (arXiv)

  23. 2403.14747 Compressible quantum matter with vanishing Drude weight (arXiv)
